original_title: WEIT. Die Geschichte von einem Weg um die Welt
overview: Dokumentation about the Journey of Patrick Allgair and Gwendolin Weisser, they travelled over 100.000 Kilometres on foot and by hitch-hiking. Starting in Freiburg, Germany they start travelling East, it took three and a half years and they came through Ukraine, Russia, China, Japan and Mexico on their way around the world.
tagline: The Story of a Journey around the World
title: FAR. The Story of a Journey around the World
